HiBoP

HiBoP is an application dedicated to the visualization of intracranial brain recordings such as intracranial electroencephalography (iEEG), cortico-cortical evoked potentials (CCEP) and functional magnetic resonance imaging (fMRI).

Official ressources

  • HiBoP GitHub

  • HiBoP tutorial

Documentation and executables (Linux, MacOS, Windows) are available in the GitHub repository.

Acknowledgements

This open source software code was developed in part or in whole in the Human Brain Project, funded from the European Union’s Horizon 2020 Framework Programme for Research and Innovation under the Specific Grant Agreement No. 785907 (Human Brain Project SGA2).
